name: oozy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
thick, soft, and sticky: It's a delicious but very oozy cheese that starts to spread out almost as soon as you remove the wrapper. The oozy caramel layer is my favourite part of a banoffee pie.
that flows slowly out of something, often through a small opening: They tap the maple trees and collect the oozy sap to make maple syrup.
More examplesFewer examplesWe trudged barefoot across the oozy mud.The cut on her finger had started to go a bit oozy so she went to get it checked.
